subject: RE: Flock Camera Destroyed
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Good morning,
 
Thank you for reaching out and letting us know about location P#021 River Rd @ Randy Pape Beltline NB & P#032 Chambers St @ 25th Ave NB. I'm sorry to hear about the vandalism and theft occurring to the Flock equipment.
 
I wanted to confirm before submitting a ticket with our Field Operations Team for reinstallation of both locations. Would the PD and you prefer to relocate the equipment to traffic light poles? If so, please let me know and I can kick of the relocation process instead.
 
Thank you & stay safe,
George
 
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: DEWITT Derek A [ddewitt@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 6/10/2025, 1:32 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com
Cc: gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com; matt.triana@flocksafety.com
Subject: Flock Camera Destroyed



Good afternoon,

 

We continue to have cameras that are being separated right at the middle of the pole, taken off the pole and smashed on the ground.  They are removing the bolt in the middle each time.

 

Here is the list on the newest ones that have been destroyed.

 

P#021 River Road @ Randy Pape Beltline NB                                                   This one was seen on the ground but stolen before an officer arrived.

Serial 541109P021007ED

 

P#032 Chambers Street @ 25th Avenue NB                                                       This one was recovered and taken to our evidence unit.  

Serial 241109P0210092Z

 

The Chambers Street one was within the area we have been experiencing problems.  The River Road was quite far away, a conversation about moving any LPR�s that are on Flock poles to traffic lights needs to happen.

 

Derek

 

Detective D. DeWitt

Financial Crimes Unit

Special Weapons and Tactics Team

Background Investigations Team

Eugene Police Department

Eugene, OR 97401
